ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control Synchronizer
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically applies Better Pawn Control (BPC) policies across all supported tabs—including Work, Schedule, Assign, Animals, Weapons, Mechs, and Robots—based on matching policy labels. BPC Synchronizer enhances your gameplay by streamlining pawn micromanagement: it adds a Policy selection button and displays the currently active BPC policy directly in the main tab labels for better visibility.
** Requires the Better Pawn Control and Harmony.
